actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to require that the fixing or adjusting of certain allowances of Members of the House of Representatives by the Committee on House Administration be approved by the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Requires that the fixing or adjusting of specified allowances of Members of the House of Representatives by the Committee on House Administration be approved by the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Resolution to require that the fixing or adjusting of certain allowances of Members of the House of Representatives by the Committee on House Administration be approved by the House of Representatives.
